entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Marystown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:27 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 07:30 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: 33 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries or rain showers beginning this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm except rainfall amount 2 mm along parts of the coast. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:36 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain or rain this evening then to ice pellets or freezing rain before morning. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Snowfall amount 5 cm north of Terrenceville. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 06:36 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow changing to snow in the morning and ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:36 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023
